Menu.Description: Anyone can serve wings in a basket. Introducing Wings Two-Four: Twenty-four wings served in a little beer case.

Content.description: A triple order of wings in one little beer case. Choose two of your favourite flavours. You’d better bring your appetite.
Content.title: Case of Wings

Content.description: A boneless bite, lightly breaded and fried, made with seasoned chicken breast.
Content.title: All Meat Bites

Content.description: Lightly breaded and fried.
Content.title: Breaded Wings

Content.description: Fried until golden and crispy.
Content.title: Fried Wings

Content.description: Double baked, double delicious.
Content.title: Oven-Roasted Wings

Content.description: Diced BBQ chicken, bacon and red onions baked on our flatbread with sweet and smoky BBQ sauce and pizza mozzarella, then topped with a drizzle of ranch dressing and a sprinkling of fresh parsley.
Content.title: Southwest Flatbread

Content.description: Our signature marinara sauce, pizza mozzarella, Kalamata olives, sun-dried tomatoes, marinated artichoke hearts, red onions and feta on our flatbread. Finished with pesto and freshly grated Parmesan.
Content.title: Mediterranean Flatbread

Content.description: Spicy arrabbiata pizza sauce, pizza mozzarella, chorizo and spicy Italian sausage and banana peppers on our flatbread.  Finished with green onions and pesto.
Content.title: Spicy Italian Sausage and Chorizo Flatbread

Content.description: Our golden pizza bread brushed with Italian seasoning, baked with pizza mozzarella and Parmesan. Served with Santa Fe ranch dip.
Content.title: Bandera Pizza Bread

Content.description: Our legendary pizza dough baked to a picture perfect golden brown and seasoned with garlic, herbs and parmesan.
Content.title: Boston's Pizza Bread

Content.description: Fresh from the oven, brushed with butter and garlic.
Content.title: Garlic Toast

Content.description: Loaded with bubbling cheddar, pizza mozzarella and Parmesan with a hint of garlic.
Content.title: Three Cheese Toast

Content.description: Tender pork ribs fried and tossed in a salt & pepper dry rub and finished with chopped red peppers.
Content.title: Salt and Pepper Dry Ribs

Content.description: Spicy and thinly sliced fried potatoes served with our mouth-watering cactus dip - a rich blend of crushed chilies, green onion, sour cream and Parmesan.
Content.title: Cactus Cut Potatoes

Content.description: Original or Buffalo style. Lightly breaded chicken breast filet served with your choice of dipping sauce.
Content.title: Chicken Fingers

Content.description: A delicious baked blend of spinach, marinated artichokes hearts, roasted garlic, balsamic-roasted red onions, Parmesan and pizza mozzarella seasoned with a hint of Cajun spice. Topped with fresh tomatoes and feta. Served piping hot with Boston’s Pizza Bread.
Content.title: Spinach and Artichoke Dip

Content.description: Tender calamari and banana peppers lightly dusted and deep fried to perfection.  Served with chili lime mayo for dipping.
Content.title: Calamari

Content.description: Your choice of either breaded chicken breast filet or breaded jalapeno shrimp, fried and then tossed in a sweet Thai chili sauce, served on a bed of crunchy Asian noodles and finished with julienne carrots, fresh cilantro, green onions and sesame seeds.
Content.title: Thai Bites

Content.description: Serves 3 – 5. BP’s appetizer platter is perfect for groups and satisfies everyone’s cravings. Enjoy a taste of our Cactus Cut Potatoes, Three-Cheese Toast, Bandera Pizza Bread and your choice of two of the following: Salt and Pepper Dry Ribs, Wings or Cheeseburger Sliders. Due to the nature of this item, we recommend it be enjoyed in the restaurant and do not offer it for Take-out or Delivery.
Content.title: The Starting Lineup

Content.description: A rich broth made with sherry and a blend of sweet yellow and white onions. Baked with a toasted crouton and then topped with pizza mozzarella, cheddar, feta and parmesan.
Content.title: Baked French Onion Soup

Content.description: All in favour of a great soup, raise your spoon! Our soup is hearty, delicious and served fresh every day. Ask your server for today’s choice
Content.title: Soup of the Day

Content.description: Hand cut tortilla chips layered with a blend of cheddar and pizza mozzarella. Topped with green peppers, black olives, jalapeño peppers and your choice of either chorizo sausage, seasoned ground beef, BBQ chicken or spicy chicken. Finished with fresh tomatoes and green onions. Served with salsa and sour cream. Due to the nature of this item, we recommend it be enjoyed in the restaurant and do not offer it for Take-out or Delivery.
Content.title: BP’s New Classic Nachos (Serves 3–5)

Content.description: Our new Smoked Applewood seasoned Cactus Cut chips covered in layers of pizza mozzarella, cheddar, sliced BBQ steak, house-roasted red peppers and red onions. Finished with drizzled horseradish mayo and green onions. Served with salsa and our signature cactus dip. Due to the nature of this item, we recommend it be enjoyed in the restaurant and do not offer it for Take-out or Delivery.
Content.title: Cheesesteak Cactus Cut Nachos

Content.description: Our new Smoked Applewood seasoned Cactus Cut chips covered in layers of pizza mozzarella, cheddar, bacon, jalapeno peppers and topped with sour cream and green onions. Served with salsa and our signature cactus dip. Due to the nature of this item, we recommend it be enjoyed in the restaurant and do not offer it for Take-out or Delivery.
Content.title: Spicy Perogy Cactus Cut Nachos

Menu.Description: You can do irrefutably impossible things with the right amount of planning and support from intelligent and hardworking people and pizza. - Scott M. Gimple

Content.description: Classic pizza with our signature pizza sauce and pizza mozzarella.
Content.title: Build your own pizza

Content.description: A carnivore’s delight created with our beefy Bolognese sauce, smoked ham, pepperoni, seasoned ground beef, spicy Italian sausage and mounds of pizza mozzarella.
Content.title: The Meateor™

Content.description: A crowning achievement created with our signature pizza sauce, smoked ham, pepperoni, shrimp, olives, green pepper, onion, fresh mushrooms and pizza mozzarella.
Content.title: Boston Royal

Content.description: 100% pure hoser: our signature pizza sauce, pizza mozzarella, cheddar and smoked ham. Bring your own toque, eh.
Content.title: Great White North

Content.description: An inspired combination of sour cream, smoky bacon and BP's Favourite Cactus Cut Potatoes with pizza mozzarella and cheddar, topped with green onion and a generous dollop of sour cream.
Content.title: Spicy Perogy

Content.description: Tender chicken breast tossed in our sweet and smoky BBQ sauce and baked with our signature pizza sauce, fresh mushrooms, pizza mozzarella and cheddar.
Content.title: BBQ Chicken

Content.description:
Signature pizza sauce, pizza mozzarella, cheddar, seasoned ground beef,
smoky bacon, onion and fresh mushrooms.
Content.title: Bacon Double Cheeseburger

Content.description: Signature pizza sauce, pizza mozzarella, pepperoni, smoked ham, green pepper and fresh mushrooms.
Content.title: Deluxe

Content.description: Signature pizza sauce, pizza mozzarella, smoked ham and pineapple.
Content.title: Hawaiian

Content.description: Signature pizza sauce, pizza mozzarella and loads of pepperoni.
Content.title: Pepperoni

Content.description: Signature pizza sauce, pizza mozzarella, fresh mushrooms, green peppers and onions, topped with fresh tomato slices. For a lighter option try it as a small multrigrain thin crust.
Content.title: Vegetarian

Content.description: A Mediterranean masterpiece. Signature pizza sauce, pizza mozzarella, fresh spinach and mushrooms, sun-dried tomatoes, marinated artichoke hearts and feta. Finished with a pesto drizzle.
Content.title: Mediterranean

Content.description: An Italian delight created with our arrabbiata pizza sauce, Genoa salami, chopped bacon, Italian sausage, roasted red peppers, banana peppers, goat cheese and pizza mozzarella and finished with Parmesan cheese and a pesto drizzle.
Content.title: Viva Italia

Content.description: Our signature alfredo sauce, pizza mozzarella, cheddar, smoky bacon, spicy chicken breast and pineapple.
Content.title: Tropical Chicken

Content.description: Our signature marinara sauce, pizza mozzarella, cheddar, spicy chicken breast, roasted garlic, fresh spinach, sun-dried tomatoes and feta.
Content.title: Tuscan

Content.description: Signature pizza sauce, pizza mozzarella, cheddar, spicy Italian sausage, red onions, green peppers and herbs, finished with fresh diced tomatoes and freshly grated Parmesan.
Content.title: Rustic Italian

Content.description: GlutenWise<sup>TM‡</sup> pizza with our signature pizza sauce and pizza mozzarella. Available for 8" individual pizzas only with a maximum of four toppings, priced accordingly.
Content.title: GlutenWise™‡

Menu.Description: We see your low-carb diet, and raise you one big, hot, delicious bowl of pasta.

Content.description: Sautéed spicy Italian sausage with balsamic-roasted red onions and red peppers over penne noodles, tossed in arrabbiata tomato and white wine sauce and finished with fresh Parmesan.
Content.title: Spicy Sausage Arrabbiata Penne

Content.description: Fettuccini tossed in our signature marinara sauce with tender chicken breast, shrimp, spicy Italian sausage, tomatoes, green peppers and topped with green onions.
Content.title: Jambalaya Fettuccini

Content.description: A spicy mix of chipotle seasoning, smoky bacon and our signature alfredo sauce, tossed with penne, fresh mushrooms, green onions, diced tomatoes, cheddar and pizza mozzarella, then topped with more cheddar and pizza mozzarella and baked to perfection.
Content.title: Baked Chipotle Bacon Penne

Content.description: Ravioli stuffed with Parmesan, Emmental, ricotta, fontina and Romano with your choice of our beefy Bolognese or signature marinara sauce, finished with pizza mozzarella and cheddar, then baked to perfection.
Content.title: Baked-Seven Cheese Ravioli

Content.description: Our beefy Bolognese sauce layered over tender noodles, topped with pizza mozzarella, then baked to perfection and finished with fresh Parmesan.
Content.title: Boston's Lasagna

Content.description: A mountainous serving of spaghetti smothered in our beefy Bolognese sauce, with hearty homestyle meatballs and cheddar.
Content.title: Boston's Smoky Mountain Spaghetti and Meatballs

Content.description: Tender sautéed chicken breast and fresh mushrooms tossed in our signature Marsala cream sauce with fettuccini, tomatoes and green onion.
Content.title: Chicken and Mushroom Fettuccini

Content.description: Bowtie noodles tossed in our signature alfredo pesto sauce with sun-dried tomatoes, topped with a grilled chicken breast. Finished with fresh tomatoes and Asiago.
Content.title: Pesto Chicken Bowtie

Content.description: Bowtie noodles in our signature marinara sauce with basil pesto and white wine, topped with red peppers, red onions, marinated artichoke hearts, sun-dried tomatoes, mushrooms, fresh spinach and a dash of crushed chilies. Finished with fresh tomatoes and feta.
Content.title: Mediterranean Vegetable Bowtie

Content.description: A modified half order of our Mediterran Vegetable Bowtie - Bowtie noodles in our signature marinara sauce with basil pesto and white wine, topped with red peppers, red onions, marinated artichoke hearts, sun-dried tomatoes, mushrooms, fresh spinach and a dash of crushed chilies. Finished with fresh tomatoes and feta.
Content.title: Smart Eats - Mediterranean Vegetable Bowtie

Content.description: Sautéed shrimp, garlic and red onions tossed with spaghetti and a white wine, pesto and Parmesan sauce. Finished with fresh tomatoes and freshly grated Parmesan.
Content.title: Boston’s Garlic Shrimp Spaghetti

Menu.Description: Now, this is double-fisting. All of our seriously hefty burgers and sandwiches are served with your choice of fries, Caesar or house salad.

Content.description: It doesn’t get any better than our reimagined beef dip. Thinly sliced steak piled high on a toasted garlic-brushed bun with melted pizza mozzarella, braised onions, roasted red peppers and crispy onion straws. Served with horseradish mayo and jus for dipping.
Content.title: The Big Dipper

Content.description: A deli style sandwich for the ages, this BP Favourite is loaded with Genoa salami, pepperoni, smoked ham, pizza mozzarella, onion and pizza sauce. Baked on a French-style bun.
Content.title: Boston Brute

Content.description: Breaded chicken breast filet tossed in hot sauce served on a toasted French-style bun with lettuce, tomato and our creamy garlic Parmesan sauce.
Content.title: Buffalo Chicken Sandwich

Content.description: A tortilla stuffed with tender chicken, sun-dried tomatoes, cheddar, pizza mozzarella, sun-dried tomato pesto and tangy chipotle sauce, then brushed with garlic spread and Parmesan and oven baked to golden perfection. Served with sour cream and salsa for dipping.
Content.title: Oven-Roasted Chicken Quesadilla

Content.description:
An 8-ounce New York strip loin steak, aged a minimum of 28 days to the peak of tenderness and flavour, seasoned with Montréal steak spice and charbroiled the
way you like it. Served on a French-style bun, topped with sautéed mushrooms and balsamic-roasted red onions and finished with fresh Parmesan.
Content.title: Steak Sandwich

Content.description: BP's take on a classic. A juicy chargrilled chicken breast, crispy bacon, fresh tomatoes, lettuce and tangy chipotle Caesar sauce piled between two pieces of our signature pizza bread.
Content.title: Chipotle Chicken Club

Content.description:
Three grilled soft tacos filled with lettuce, red onions, cilantro, cheddar and tomatoes with a hint of lime, topped with crunchy tortilla strips, our creamy sweet chili sauce and your choice of breaded jalapeño shrimp or grilled chicken breast.
Due to the nature of this item, we recommend it be enjoyed in the restaurant and do not offer it for Take-out or Delivery.
Content.title: Tacos

Menu.Description: For serious eaters only. All mains come with a ‘Do Not Disturb’ sign to hang around your neck.

Content.description: Our signature patty – 100% Canadian beef, salt and pepper, smothered in our BBQ sauce made with Jack Daniel’s<sup>®</sup>, loaded with bacon and placed between a brioche bun.
Content.title: Double Bacon BBQ Burger

Content.description: Our signature patty – 100% Canadian beef, salt and pepper, wrapped in a pepperoni pizza and stuffed with bacon, pizza mozzarella and our signature pizza sauce, topped with even more pepperoni and pizza mozzarella, then baked to perfection. Garnished with lettuce, tomato and a pickle.
Content.title: Pepperoni and Bacon Pizzaburger

Content.description: Not your average veggie burger. Our soy based veggie patty, topped with lettuce, tomatoes, red onions, pickles on a toasted bun.
Content.title: Veggie Burger

Content.description: Our 100% Canadian all-beef patty contains nothing but the simplest of ingredients – beef, salt and pepper! Placed between a brioche bun and topped with real cheddar cheese, fresh lettuce, tomatoes, red onions, pickles and our signature cactus dip.
Content.title: The MVB (Most Valuable Burger)

Content.description: Well, looky what we’ve got here. Super tender, oh-so-slowly roasted pork back ribs baked in your choice of one of our three tasty sauces. Served with garlic toast, seasonal vegetables and your choice of side dish.
Content.title: Slow-Roasted Pork Back Ribs

Content.description: A tender chicken breast, breaded and fried until golden brown, topped with our signature marinara sauce and pizza mozzarella, then baked to perfection. Served with garlic toast, seasonal vegetables and your choice of side dish.
Content.title: Chicken Parmesan

Content.description: An 8-ounce New York strip loin steak, aged a minimum of 28 days to the peak of tenderness and charbroiled the way you like it. Served with garlic toast, seasonal vegetables and your choice of side dish.
Content.title: NY Striploin Steak

Content.description: A half rack of succulent, oh-so-slowly roasted pork back ribs  smothered in your choice of our signature BBQ, honey garlic or BBQ sauce made with Jack Daniel’s<sup>®</sup>, paired with six Boston’s famous wings prepared just the way you like them. Served with garlic toast, seasonal vegetables and your choice of side dish.
Content.title: Ribber-Winger Combo

Content.description: A wild salmon fillet seasoned with an authentic cedar smoke flavour that's perfectly balanced with notes of tangy lemon, garlic and a blend of spices. Served with a grilled half lemon, seasonal vegetables and your choice of side.
Content.title: Cedar Seasoned Salmon Filet

Content.description: A wild salmon fillet seasoned with an authentic cedar smoke flavour that's perfectly balanced with notes of tangy lemon, garlic and a blend of spices. Served with a grilled half lemon, steamed seasonal vegetables and and a side house salad with our low-fat poppy seed dressing. (Not served with garlic toast)
Content.title: Smart Eats - Cedar Seasoned Salmon Filet

Content.description: An 8-ounce New York strip loin steak, aged a minimum of 28 days to the peak of tenderness and charbroiled the way you like it. Served with steamed seasonal vegetables and and a side house salad with our low-fat poppy seed dressing. (Not served with garlic toast)
Content.title: Smart Eats - NY Striploin Steak

Menu.Description: There's no such thing as food-envy here. Especially when you order our tasty salads.

Content.description: BP’s signature house blend of garden greens, red pepper, red onions and carrot ribbons tossed in our citrus vinaigrette. Topped with julienned beets.
Content.title: BP’s House Salad

Content.description: Romaine lettuce tossed in our signature creamy garlic dressing, topped with crunchy croutons and bacon. Finished with freshly grated Parmesan.
Content.title: Caesar Salad

Content.description: Garden greens tossed in a tomato tarragon dressing with cucumbers, red onions, red peppers and tomatoes. Topped with feta and Kalamata olives.
Content.title: Mediterranean Salad

Content.description: Baby spinach tossed in our citrus vinaigrette and topped oven-roasted mushrooms, marinated artichoke hearts, bacon and balsamic-roasted red onions.  Finished with fresh tomatoes, crumbled feta and chopped egg.
Content.title: Market Spinach Salad

Content.description: Brussels Sprouts are throwing a party and bacon’s invited. Shredded rainbow kale, romaine lettuce and sliced red onions tossed in a poppy seed dressing. Topped with roasted Brussel sprouts, bacon, dried cranberries, toasted pumpkin seeds and crumbled goat cheese.
Content.title: BB&K Salad

Content.description: Breaded chicken breast filet, toasted pecans, pizza mozzarella, cheddar, smoky bacon, chopped egg, julienne carrots and diced tomato over fresh garden greens tossed in ranch dressing.
Content.title: Crispy Chicken Pecan Salad

Content.description: An arugula and Tuscan lettuce blend tossed in a strawberry balsamic dressing, with roasted red beets, roasted peaches, candied pecans, roasted red peppers and goat cheese. Finished with pesto and a balsamic glaze.
Content.title: Roasted Beet and Peach Salad

Content.description: BP’s signature house blend of garden greens, red peppers, red onions and carrot ribbons tossed in our citrus vinaigrette. Topped with julienned beets, feta, dried cranberries, toasted almonds and a grilled chicken breast.
Content.title: BP’s House Chicken Salad

Content.description: BP’s signature house blend of garden greens, red peppers, red onions and carrot ribbons served with our low-fat poppy seed dressing. Topped with julienned beets, feta, dried cranberries, toasted almonds and a grilled chicken breast.
Content.title: Smart Eats - BP's House Chicken Salad

Content.description: Romaine lettuce tossed in our signature creamy garlic dressing, topped with crunchy croutons, bacon and a grilled chicken breast. Finished with freshly grated Parmesan.
Content.title: Chicken Caesar Salad

Content.description: Our twist on a favourite. Garden greens tossed in a tomato tarragon dressing, with cucumbers, red onions, red peppers and tomatoes. Topped with feta, Kalamata olives and a grilled chicken breast.
Content.title: Mediterranean Chicken Salad

Content.description: Fresh spinach tossed in our citrus vinaigrette and topped with warm oven-roasted mushrooms, marinated artichoke hearts, bacon and balsamic roasted red onions. Topped with fresh tomatoes, feta, chopped egg and two garlic shrimp skewers
Content.title: Market Spinach and Shrimp Salad

Menu.Description: You only live once. Especially with our Died-and-Gone-To-Heaven desserts.

Content.description: A decadent treat – moist Red Velvet Cake and a cheesecake mousse, served with berry sauce and topped with whipped cream and a white chocolate coin. $1 from every cake sold goes to Boston Pizza Foundation Future Prospects.
Content.title: Future Prospects Red Velvet Cake

Content.description: Fresh from the oven, our mini donuts are tossed in icing sugar. Served with chocolate and berry sauce for dipping.  Not enough room? Try our mini donuts to go!
Content.title: Warm Mini Donuts

Content.description: This is one ice cream cake to remember! Your journey starts with a crunchy base of chocolate cookie crumble, making your way up towards layers of rich custard ice cream, vanilla ice cream and chocolate ganache, and finished with whipped cream and drizzles of our signature caramel and chocolate sauces.Due to the nature of this item, we recommend it be enjoyed in the restaurant and do not offer it for Take-out or Delivery.
Content.title: Boston Cream Piescraper™

Content.description: Sweet perfection – creamy chocolate mousse with chunks of cheesecake, caramel, toffee, pecans and almonds wrapped in our signature pizza dough and baked to perfection, then topped with icing sugar, whipped cream and chocolate sauce. Due to the nature of this item, we recommend it be enjoyed in the restaurant and do not offer it for Take-out or Delivery.
Content.title: Chocolate Doughcano

Content.description: A cheesecake lover’s delight. Traditional style creamy cheesecake piled high on a graham cracker crust.
Content.title: New York Cheesecake

Content.description: Ultimate decadence. Creamy chocolate mousse with chunks of cheesecake, caramel, toffee, pecans and almonds on a chocolate crust.
Content.title: Chocolate Explosion

Content.description: Just like mom used to make it. Slices of sweet granny smith apples in a butter sauce, baked to a crisp with a delicious brown sugar and oat crust. Topped with caramel sauce and served with a scoop of vanilla bean ice cream.Due to the nature of this item, we recommend it be enjoyed in the restaurant and do not offer it for Take-out or Delivery.
Content.title: Apple Crisp

Content.description: A warm chocolate brownie topped with two scoops of vanilla bean ice cream, caramel and chocolate sauce.Due to the nature of this item, we recommend it be enjoyed in the restaurant and do not offer it for Take-out or Delivery.
Content.title: Chocolate Brownie Addiction

Content.description: Baked to perfection! A giant, freshly baked, pizza-pan chocolate chip cookie served with vanilla bean ice cream and drizzled with chocolate and caramel sauces.Due to the nature of this item, we recommend it be enjoyed in the restaurant and do not offer it for Take-out or Delivery.
Content.title: The Panookie

Menu.Description: Hey, we’re here to make your mini-me’s happy too.

Content.description: What’s better than one pint-sized cheeseburger topped with real Canadian cheddar cheese? Two! Served with ketchup and mustard. The new BP Kids Fun Pack comes free with every kids meal.
Content.title: BP Mini Cheeseburgers

Content.description: Using our pizza mozzarella and alfredo sauce, we’ve caught colourful bugs just for you! No, they’re not real – they’re just bug-shaped pasta.  The new BP Kids Fun Pack comes free with every kids meal.
Content.title: Bugs 'n' Cheese

Content.description:
Crispy baked (never fried) chicken fingers served with plum sauce. The Health Check™ option comes with cucumber and red pepper strips or steamed vegetables, milk or juice and a fruit cup for dessert. The new BP Kids Fun Pack comes free with every kids meal.Calories: 210, Total fat: 3 g, Saturated fat: 0.5 g, Sodium: 600 mg, Protein: 21 g
Nutrition info does not include drink or dessert.
Content.title: Chicken Fingers

Content.description: A pizza made to fit your hands. With sauce, pizza mozzarella and any topping you want – just pick one!  The new BP Kids Fun Pack comes free with every kids meal.
Content.title: Pint-Sized Pizza

Content.description: Spaghetti noodles perfect for slurping, served with tomato sauce or meat sauce on the side.  The new BP Kids Fun Pack comes free with every kids meal.
Content.title: Slurpin' Spaghetti

Content.description: A mound of gooey pizza mozzarella and cheddar on toasted bread. The new BP Kids Fun Pack comes free with every kids meal.
Content.title: Grilled Cheese

Content.description: A purple people pleaser perhaps? Zingy grape pop that’ll turn your tongue purple.
Content.title: Grape Pop Rocks

Content.description: Ice is just the tip of this iceberg. Orange, orange and more orange. Don’t drink it too fast or it’ll freeze your brain!
Content.title: Orange Iceberg Slush

Content.description: The original kids mocktail! Orange juice, 7UP<sup>®</sup> and grenadine.
Content.title: Shirley Temple

Content.description: More like, “the right-sized brownie!” A warm chocolate brownie topped with a scoop of vanilla bean ice cream and drizzled with caramel and chocolate sauces.
Content.title: Bite-Size Brownie

Content.description: Chocolate pudding squirming with gummy worms (no real worms or dirt were harmed in the making of this dessert).
Content.title: Worms 'n' Dirt

Menu.Description: Try one of our Gluten Friendly Dishes. They're just as good... We promise!

Content.description: Choose one of seven GlutenWise<sup>TM‡</sup> flavours. Twice-baked and served with ranch dipping sauce.
Content.title: Boston’s Famous Wings

Content.description: GlutenWise<sup>TM‡</sup> pizza with our signature pizza sauce and pizza mozzarella. Available for 8" individual pizzas only with a maximum of four toppings, priced accordingly.
Content.title: GlutenWise™‡

Content.description: GlutenWise<sup>TM‡</sup> fusilli with your choice of sauce and protein.
Content.title: Create your own pasta

Content.description: Grilled chicken breast, toasted pecans, pizza mozzarella, cheddar, smoky bacon, chopped egg, julienne carrots and diced tomatoes over fresh garden greens tossed in ranch dressing.
Content.title: GlutenWise™‡ Grilled Chicken Pecan Salad

Content.description: Our twist on a favourite. Chunks of cucumbers, red onions, red peppers and tomatoes tossed in a Mediterranean vinaigrette with feta and kalamata olives on a bed of garden greens.
Content.title: GlutenWise™‡ Mediterranean Salad

Content.description: Romaine lettuce tossed in our signature creamy garlic dressing and topped with bacon. Finished with freshly grated Parmesan.
Content.title: GlutenWise™‡ Caesar Salad

Content.description: Brussels Sprouts are throwing a party and bacon’s invited. Shredded rainbow kale, romaine lettuce and sliced red onions tossed in a poppy seed dressing. Topped with roasted Brussel sprouts, bacon, dried cranberries, toasted pumpkin seeds and crumbled goat cheese.
Content.title: GlutenWise™‡ BB&K Salad

Content.description: An arugula and Tuscan lettuce blend tossed in a strawberry balsamic dressing, with roasted red beets, roasted peaches, candied pecans, roasted red peppers and goat cheese. Finished with pesto and a balsamic glaze.
Content.title: GlutenWise™‡ Roasted Beet and Peach

Content.description: BP’s signature house blend of garden greens, red peppers, red onions and carrot ribbons served with our low-fat poppy seed dressing. Topped with julienned beets, feta, dried cranberries, toasted almonds and a grilled chicken breast.
Content.title: GlutenWise™‡ BP's House Chicken Salad

Content.description: BP’s signature house blend of garden greens, red pepper, red onions and carrot ribbons tossed in our citrus vinaigrette. Topped with julienned beets.
Content.title: GlutenWise™‡ BP's House Salad

Content.description: Romaine lettuce tossed in our signature creamy garlic dressing, topped with bacon and a grilled chicken breast. Finished with freshly grated Parmesan.
Content.title: GlutenWise™‡ Chicken Caesar Salad

Content.description: Our twist on a favourite. Garden greens tossed in a tomato tarragon dressing, with cucumbers, red onions, red peppers and tomatoes. Topped with feta, Kalamata olives and a grilled chicken breast.
Content.title: GlutenWise™‡ Mediterranean Chicken Salad

Content.description: Fresh spinach tossed in our citrus vinaigrette and topped with warm oven-roasted mushrooms, marinated artichoke hearts, bacon and balsamic roasted red onions. Topped with fresh tomatoes, feta, chopped egg and two garlic shrimp skewers
Content.title: GlutenWise™‡ Market Spinach and Shrimp Salad

Content.description: An 8-ounce New York strip loin steak, aged a minimum of 28 days to the peak of tenderness and charbroiled the way you like it. Served with garlic toast, seasonal vegetables and your choice of side dish.
Content.title: NY Striploin Steak

Content.description: An 8-ounce New York strip loin steak, aged a minimum of 28 days to the peak of tenderness and charbroiled the way you like it. Served with steamed seasonal vegetables and and a side house salad with our low-fat poppy seed dressing. (Not served with garlic toast)
Content.title: Smart Eats - NY Striploin Steak

Content.description: A wild salmon fillet seasoned with an authentic cedar smoke flavour that's perfectly balanced with notes of tangy lemon, garlic and a blend of spices. Served with a grilled half lemon, seasonal vegetables and your choice of side.
Content.title: Cedar Seasoned Salmon Filet

Content.description: A wild salmon fillet seasoned with an authentic cedar smoke flavour that's perfectly balanced with notes of tangy lemon, garlic and a blend of spices. Served with a grilled half lemon, steamed seasonal vegetables and and a side house salad with our low-fat poppy seed dressing. (Not served with garlic toast)
Content.title: Smart Eats - Cedar Seasoned Salmon Filet

Content.description: 7Up<sup>®</sup>, Pepsi<sup>®</sup>, Diet Pepsi<sup>®</sup>, MUG<sup>®</sup> Root Beer, Brisk<sup>®</sup> Iced Tea 12 Oz can. Delivery / Pick-Up only.
Content.title: 12 Oz Can of Pop

Content.description: 7Up<sup>®</sup>, Pepsi<sup>®</sup>, Diet Pepsi<sup>®</sup>,  MUG<sup>®</sup> Root Beer,  Brisk<sup>®</sup> Iced Tea 12 Oz can. Delivery / Pick-Up only.
Content.title: 6-Pack of 12 Oz Cans of Pop

Content.description: Aquafina<sup>®</sup> Bottled Water (591ml)
Content.title: Bottled Water

Content.description: Choose from apple or orange juice.
Content.title: Fruit Juice

Content.description: No one's going to be mad at you because you ordered too many fries.
Content.title: Side Fries

Content.description: A heaping helping of garlicky, fluffy carb-a-licious goodness.
Content.title: Side Garlic Mashed Potatoes

Content.description: So much easier than growing, harvesting, and sauteing your own side order.
Content.title: Side Seasonal Vegetables

Content.description: Slices of sweet yams, fried until golden and crispy and served with a side of our tangy chipotle dip.
Content.title: Side Yam Fries

Content.description: Creamy, white-winey, parmesany heaven. Not just for fettucine anymore.
Content.title: Side Alfredo
